commodities.name: Sparkle Rocks
commodities.description: Raw minerals hauled from asteroid belts. Heavy as sin, cheap as dirt.

commodities.name: Space Junk
commodities.description: Salvaged ship parts and debris. One spacer's trash is another's treasure.

commodities.name: Space Wheat
commodities.description: Genetically modified grain that grows in low gravity. Tastes like cardboard, sustains colonies.

commodities.name: Gloop Juice
commodities.description: Refined hydrogen slurry. Smells terrible, powers everything.

commodities.name: Clanky Bits
commodities.description: Assorted mechanical components. Every ship needs them, eventually.

commodities.name: Glowing Pills
commodities.description: Pharmaceuticals that may or may not glow in the dark. Side effects vary by planet.

commodities.name: Blinky Boxes
commodities.description: Advanced electronics with lots of blinking lights. Nobody knows what half of them do.

commodities.name: Big Clankers
commodities.description: Heavy industrial equipment. Worth a fortune but eats your cargo hold alive.

commodities.name: Zesty Dust
commodities.description: Exotic seasonings from across the system. Light, valuable, and highly sought after.

commodities.name: Fun Cubes
commodities.description: Holographic entertainment devices. Workers demand them, governments fear them.

commodities.name: Ancient Junk
commodities.description: Mysterious relics of unknown origin. Collectors pay absurd prices. Found only at outer research stations.

commodities.name: Definitely Legal
commodities.description: Completely legitimate goods that definitely don't need to be hidden from authorities.
